# Hello, I'm Dianchen Li

Welcome to my personal website. I'm a graduate student in the Mailman School of Public Health at Columbia University focusing on data science, health analytics, and reproducible research.

## About Me

I am passionate about leveraging statistical learning and visualization to inform better decisions in public health. My current projects emphasize collaborative, reproducible workflows and clear communication of data-driven insights.

## What You'll Find Here

- Highlights of my academic and professional experience on the [Experience](resume.html) page.
- An interactive [data visualization dashboard](dashboard.html) created for this assignment using the Instacart dataset.
- Links to my GitHub profile, LinkedIn page, and email in the site navigation.

Thanks for visiting, and feel free to reach out!
